flavor_text_entries.gold:
If static elec­
tricity builds in
its body, its fleece doubles in
volume. Touching
it will shock you.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
Its fleece grows
continually. In
the summer, the fleece is fully
shed, but it grows
back in a week.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
It stores lots of
air in its soft
fur, allowing it to stay cool in
summer and warm
in winter.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
MAREEP’s fluffy coat of wool rubs
together and builds a static charge.
The more static electricity is charged, the more brightly the lightbulb at the
tip of its tail grows.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
MAREEP’s fluffy coat of wool rubs
together and builds a static charge.
The more static electricity is charged, the more brightly the lightbulb at the
tip of its tail grows.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Its fluffy wool rubs together and builds
a static charge. The more energy is
charged, the more brightly the lightbulb
at the tip of its tail glows.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
Its fleece grows continually. In the
summer, the fleece is fully shed, but it
grows back in a week.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
If static electricity builds in its body,
its fleece doubles in volume. Touching
it will shock you.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
Its fluffy coat swells to double
when static electricity builds up.
Touching it can be shocking.

Its fluffy coat swells to double
when static electricity builds up.
Touching it can be shocking.

Touching it can be shocking.

Its fluffy coat swells to double

flavor_text_entries.black-2:
When cold weather increases static
electricity, its wool doubles in size
and the tip of its tail glows slightly.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
When cold weather increases static
electricity, its wool doubles in size
and the tip of its tail glows slightly.
flavor_text_entries.x:
Its fluffy coat swells to double when static
electricity builds up. Touching it can be shocking.
flavor_text_entries.y:
It stores lots of air in its soft fur, allowing it to stay
cool in summer and warm in winter.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Mareep’s fluffy coat of wool rubs together and builds a static
charge. The more static electricity is charged, the more brightly
the lightbulb at the tip of its tail glows.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Mareep’s fluffy coat of wool rubs together and builds a static
charge. The more static electricity is charged, the more brightly
the lightbulb at the tip of its tail glows.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
Clothing made from Mareep’s fleece is easily
charged with static electricity, so a special
process is used on it.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
Rubbing its fleece generates electricity.
You’ll want to pet it because it’s cute, but if you
use your bare hand, you’ll get a painful shock.
